018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.report;
019
020import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
021import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.CallableByActionName;
022import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.JsonState;
023import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.ActorSystemAware;
024import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
025import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
026
027import org.json.JSONObject;
028import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
029
030import java.io.InputStream;
031import java.nio.file.Files;
032import java.nio.file.Path;
033import java.nio.file.Paths;
034import java.util.ArrayList;
035import java.util.Comparator;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.Map;
038import java.util.logging.Logger;
039
040/**
041 * Section-based workflow report builder.
042 *
043 * <p>Assembles {@link ReportSection} instances into a unified report.
044 * Can be used from workflows via {@code loader.createChild}.</p>
045 *
046 * <h2>Usage in workflows:</h2>
047 * <pre>{@code
048 * steps:
049 *   - states: ["0", "1"]
050 *     actions:
051 *       - actor: loader
052 *         method: createChild
053 *         arguments: ["ROOT", "reportBuilder", "com.scivicslab.actoriac.report.ReportBuilder"]
054 *       - actor: reportBuilder
055 *         method: addWorkflowInfo
056 *
057 *   - states: ["1", "2"]
058 *     actions:
059 *       - actor: nodeGroup
060 *         method: apply
061 *         arguments:
062 *           actor: "node-*"
063 *           method: runWorkflow
064 *           arguments: ["sub-workflow.yaml"]
065 *
066 *   - states: ["2", "end"]
067 *     actions:
068 *       - actor: reportBuilder
069 *         method: addJsonStateSection
070 *         arguments:
071 *           actor: "node-localhost"
072 *       - actor: reportBuilder
073 *         method: report
074 * }</pre>
075 *
076 * <h2>Actions:</h2>
077 * <ul>
078 *   <li>{@code addWorkflowInfo} - Add workflow metadata section</li>
079 *   <li>{@code addJsonStateSection} - Add actor's JsonState as YAML (args: {"actor": "name", "path": "optional"})</li>
080 *   <li>{@code report} - Build and output the report to outputMultiplexer</li>
081 * </ul>
082 *
083 * <p>Transition履歴の詳細表示は{@code TransitionViewerPlugin}で行う。</p>
084 *
085 * @author devteam@scivicslab.com
086 * @since 2.15.0
087 */
088public class ReportBuilder implements CallableByActionName, ActorSystemAware {
089
090    private static final String CLASS_NAME = ReportBuilder.class.getName();
091    private static final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(CLASS_NAME);
092
093    private final List<ReportSection> sections = new ArrayList<>();
094    private IIActorSystem system;
095
096    /**
097     * Default constructor for use with loader.createChild.
098     */
099    public ReportBuilder() {
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    public void setActorSystem(IIActorSystem system) {
104        this.system = system;
105        logger.info("ReportBuilder: ActorSystem set");
106    }
107
108    // ========================================================================
109    // CallableByActionName implementation
110    // ========================================================================
111
112    @Override
113    public ActionResult callByActionName(String actionName, String args) {
114        logger.info("ReportBuilder.callByActionName: " + actionName);
115
116        return switch (actionName) {
117            case "addWorkflowInfo" -> addWorkflowInfo(args);
118            case "addJsonStateSection" -> addJsonStateSection(args);
119            case "report" -> report(args);
120            default -> new ActionResult(false, "Unknown action: " + actionName);
121        };
122    }
123
124    // ========================================================================
125    // Actions
126    // ========================================================================
127
128    /**
129     * Adds workflow info section.
130     */
131    private ActionResult addWorkflowInfo(String args) {
132        String workflowPath = getWorkflowPathFromNodeGroup();
133        if (workflowPath == null) {
134            return new ActionResult(false, "Could not get workflow path from nodeGroup");
135        }
136
137        String name = null;
138        String description = null;
139
140        // Try to read workflow YAML for name and description
141        try {
142            Path path = Paths.get(workflowPath);
143            if (!Files.exists(path)) {
144                path = Paths.get(System.getProperty("user.dir"), workflowPath);
145            }
146
147            if (Files.exists(path)) {
148                try (InputStream is = Files.newInputStream(path)) {
149                    Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
150                    Map<String, Object> data = yaml.load(is);
151                    if (data != null) {
152                        name = (String) data.get("name");
153                        Object descObj = data.get("description");
154                        description = descObj != null ? descObj.toString().trim() : null;
155                    }
156                }
157            }
158        } catch (Exception e) {
159            logger.warning("ReportBuilder.addWorkflowInfo: Could not read workflow file: " + e.getMessage());
160        }
161
162        addSection(new WorkflowInfoSection(workflowPath, name, description));
163        return new ActionResult(true, "Workflow info section added");
164    }
165
166    /**
167     * Adds JsonState section for specified actor.
168     */
169    private ActionResult addJsonStateSection(String args) {
170        String actorName;
171        String path = "";
172
173        try {
174            JSONObject json = new JSONObject(args);
175            actorName = json.getString("actor");
176            path = json.optString("path", "");
177        } catch (Exception e) {
178            return new ActionResult(false, "Invalid arguments: " + e.getMessage() +
179                ". Expected: {\"actor\": \"name\", \"path\": \"optional\"}");
180        }
181
182        if (system == null) {
183            return new ActionResult(false, "ActorSystem not available");
184        }
185
186        IIActorRef<?> targetActor = system.getIIActor(actorName);
187        if (targetActor == null) {
188            return new ActionResult(false, "Actor not found: " + actorName);
189        }
190
191        JsonState jsonState = targetActor.json();
192        if (jsonState == null) {
193            return new ActionResult(false, "Actor has no JsonState: " + actorName);
194        }
195
196        String yamlContent = jsonState.toStringOfYaml(path);
197        addSection(new JsonStateSection(actorName, yamlContent));
198
199        return new ActionResult(true, "JsonState section added for " + actorName);
200    }
201
202    /**
203     * Builds and outputs the report.
204     */
205    private ActionResult report(String args) {
206        String reportContent = build();
207        reportToMultiplexer(reportContent);
208        return new ActionResult(true, reportContent);
209    }
210
211    // ========================================================================
212    // Core Methods
213    // ========================================================================
214
215    /**
216     * Adds a section to the report.
217     *
218     * @param section the section to add
219     */
220    public void addSection(ReportSection section) {
221        if (section != null) {
222            sections.add(section);
223        }
224    }
225
226    /**
227     * Builds the report string.
228     *
229     * @return the formatted report string
230     */
231    public String build() {
232        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
233
234        // Header
235        sb.append("=== Workflow Execution Report ===\n");
236
237        // Sort sections by order and output
238        sections.stream()
239            .sorted(Comparator.comparingInt(ReportSection::getOrder))
240            .forEach(section -> {
241                String content = section.getContent();
242                if (content != null && !content.isEmpty()) {
243                    String title = section.getTitle();
244                    if (title != null && !title.isEmpty()) {
245                        sb.append("\n--- ").append(title).append(" ---\n");
246                    }
247                    sb.append(content).append("\n");
248                }
249            });
250
251        return sb.toString();
252    }
253
254    // ========================================================================
255    // Helper Methods
256    // ========================================================================
257
258    private String getWorkflowPathFromNodeGroup() {
259        if (system == null) return null;
260
261        IIActorRef<?> nodeGroup = system.getIIActor("nodeGroup");
262        if (nodeGroup == null) return null;
263
264        ActionResult result = nodeGroup.callByActionName("getWorkflowPath", "");
265        return result.isSuccess() ? result.getResult() : null;
266    }
267
268    private void reportToMultiplexer(String data) {
269        if (system == null) return;
270
271        IIActorRef<?> multiplexer = system.getIIActor("outputMultiplexer");
272        if (multiplexer == null) return;
273
274        JSONObject arg = new JSONObject();
275        arg.put("source", "report-builder");
276        arg.put("type", "plugin-result");
277        arg.put("data", data);
278        multiplexer.callByActionName("add", arg.toString());
279    }
280}
